rangeValue(majorColorEditorConfig)","backgroundColor":"transparent"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_Yaunscez"},"context":{"majorColorEditorConfig":[{"value":"#FE3A3A","to":20},{"value":"#FFD442","from":20,"to":75},{"value":"#088F44","from":75}]}}},"dataSources":{"ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:steps date != date | rename value as Steps | chart max(Steps) by date","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}},"name":"step"},"ds_search_2":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="activity.csv" 
| rename "Minutes Fairly Active" as fairly, "Minutes Lightly Active" as lightly, "Minutes Sedentary" as sedentary, "Minutes Very Active" as very
| eval fairly1=round(fairly/60,2)
| eval lightly1=round(lightly/60,2)
| eval sedentary1=round(sedentary/60,2)
| eval very1=round(very/60,2)
| stats values(fairly1) as "Fairly Active" values(lightly1) as "Lightly Active" values(sedentary1) as Sedentary values(very1) as "Very Active" by Date","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_3":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" value!=0 | rename value as Steps | chart avg(Steps)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_4":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:floors" value!=0 | rename value as Floors | chart avg(Floors)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:distance" | rename value as Distance
| stats sum(Distance)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_search_6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" | rename value as Steps | chart max(Steps)","queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"}}},"ds_GfClJNi7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-30d@d","latest":"now"},"query":"index=fitbit source=fitbit:activity:* 
| rex field=source ":(?<source_short>[^:]+)$"
| chart sum(value) as minutes by date, source"},"name":"ActiveMinutes"},"ds_aaw8bOwF":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:floors" value!=0 | rename value as Floors | chart avg(Floors)"},"name":"Search_1"},"ds_oR9Exmxg":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:floors" value!=0 | rename value as Floors | chart avg(Floors)"},"name":"Search_2"},"ds_7JK6cMR8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" value !=0 | eventstats sum(value) as steps by date | stats values(steps) as Steps by date
| fit StateSpaceForecast "Steps" output_metadata=true holdback=2 forecast_k=2 into "_exp_draft_79d66c2e0ef84673be93790f01a5f7ae"
| `smartforecastviz("Steps")`"},"name":"Search_3"},"ds_9KmUIkrK":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" value !=0 | eventstats sum(value) as steps by date | stats values(steps) as Steps by date
| fit StateSpaceForecast "Steps" output_metadata=true holdback=2 forecast_k=5 into "_exp_draft_79d66c2e0ef84673be93790f01a5f7ae"
| `smartforecastviz("Steps")`"},"name":"Search_4"},"ds_Yaunscez":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"$field1.earliest$","latest":"$field1.latest$"},"query":"index=fitbit source="fitbit:steps" 
| rename value as Steps 
| eval Steps = Steps/2.5
| chart max(Steps)"},"name":"Search_5"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{}}}}},"inputs":{"input_1":{"type":"input.timerange","title":"","options":{"token":"field1","defaultValue":"@w0,now"}}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"submitButton":false,"display":"auto-scale","height":1300,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"cover","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://63539804b8fc5709375ce2dc"}},"structure":[{"item":"viz_07CRK3zM","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":50,"w":170,"h":130}},{"item":"viz_toFuD7zU","type":"block","position":{"x":690,"y":80,"w":490,"h":470}},{"item":"viz_chart_1","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":220,"w":660,"h":370}},{"item":"viz_single_1","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":130,"w":160,"h":140}},{"item":"viz_single_3","type":"block","position":{"x":940,"y":110,"w":220,"h":160}},{"item":"viz_single_4","type":"block","position":{"x":720,"y":380,"w":100,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_0zW8CkST","type":"block","position":{"x":1120,"y":1220,"w":60,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_EZhGHM6i","type":"block","position":{"x":710,"y":100,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_RiOmzcJv","type":"block","position":{"x":710,"y":350,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_lin4JUYd","type":"block","position":{"x":940,"y":310,"w":120,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_EPixlIbs","type":"block","position":{"x":930,"y":80,"w":230,"h":70}},{"item":"viz_xgZsQX7f","type":"block","position":{"x":500,"y":240,"w":160,"h":60}},{"item":"viz_bFYwZVfA","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":580,"w":1040,"h":320}},{"item":"viz_single_2","type":"block","position":{"x":1070,"y":430,"w":100,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_d6slpOF2","type":"block","position":{"x":950,"y":370,"w":100,"h":90}},{"item":"viz_U1BD39s6","type":"block","position":{"x":100,"y":970,"w":940,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_2J7Gq1Yp","type":"block","position":{"x":110,"y":920,"w":260,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_0iqyjkA4","type":"block","position":{"x":110,"y":60,"w":160,"h":30}},{"item":"viz_ewnU9ROX","type":"block","position":{"x":120
